HUMAN LIFE PROTECTION AMENDMENT

December 11, 2019


Crosspoint Family,

I know this time of year is particularly busy and you are probably getting bombarded with emails, but we as the leadership of Crosspoint believe that we have an opportunity now to make an impact on an issue that is vitally important: protecting human life. In the video above, I talk about a proposed amendment to the Florida constitution that we would like for you to prayerfully consider supporting. If you haven't already, please watch the video before continuing reading this email because the video explains our heart and reasons behind recommending this amendment.

If you would like to do more research on this amendment, you can read the full text here:Constitutional Amendment - Full Text (PDF) or you can visit the website at: https://humanlifefl.com/

If you believe you can support this amendment, please take one of the following steps:
  • Open: Pro-life Florida Constitutional Amendment Petition (PDF) and print it out. Next you will need to fill out the petition to help get this amendment on the ballot in this next election cycle. Once you're done filling it out, you can either drop it off at any of our campuses in the office area (even on Sunday mornings), or you can mail it in yourself to the mailing address given on the petition.
  • Share this with your friends who might also be interested in helping get this amendment on the ballot.

See you Sunday,

Rurel Ausley, Lead Pastor

(850) 678-4411
rausley@crosspoint.church

If you wish to unsubscribe, please email info@crosspoint.church or call 850-678-4411.
